label: You find that a person whom you call your friend has been cheating you. What will you do?
Lily's birthday is on Thursday 27th April. On what day of the week will be Dily's Birthday in the same year if Dily was born on 28th September?
In the examination hall, you find that the question paper is too tough to be answered satisfactorily by you. What will you do?

choices.value: tell the examiner that the questions are out of course
provoke the candidates to walk out of the examination hall
try to know something from your neighbour
try to solve the questions as much as you know with a cool head

label: Select the odd word from the following.
While travelling in a train, you observe some college students pulling the alarm chain simply to get down at their desired point. What will you do?

choices.value: let them pull the chain but check them from detraining
with the help of some passengers, check them from doing so
inform the guard of the train as soon as it stops

label: An angry customer wants to meet the senior manager for grievance reporting. What will you do?

choices.value: Be patient and try to cool him down first
Try to remove his inconveniences by consulting seniors
Tell him it is not easy to meet the senior manager

label: Priya runs 5 km North, then turns East and runs 4 km, then turns South and run 5 km, then turns to her right and runs 6 km. Where is she now with reference to her starting position?
You are in a bus. The bus reaches your stop but still you have not purchased the ticket because of heavy rush.  What will you do?

choices.value: Jump out quickly to avoid embarrassment
Give the money to the driver
Hand the money to someone sitting nearby to give it to the conducto
Call the conductor, give him the money and get the ticket

label: A is B's sister. C is B's mother. D is C's father. E is D's mother. How is A related to D?

A field is 35 meters long and 27 meters wide. Field is further divided into small units of 1 square meters (1m x 1m). Nippon is in the exact middle small unit of the field. He cannot move diagonally from one small unit to another and can only move forward, backward, left, or right. How many minimum small units he will have to walk if he wants to go to one corner of the field?

Choose the correct words to fill the blanks. She takes great pride ___ her work.
Choose the correct words to fill the blanks. DVDs are ____ resistant to scratching ____ vinyl records.
Choose the correct words to fill the blanks. What will she do all day if she is left all ____
